reviews.review:
This was a tuff watch.
The movie and the previous storylines compelled you to watch.
Nevertheless, it was a tuff watch.
Worst MCU ever. Ruined the universe for me. Own all of the previous movies, but will never watch this one again.

Honestly can't think of a better movie, the summary of a 10 year story everything being set up, the tragedy the suffering the emotion, take away the superhero aspect of the movie and you've got a story that would become a timeless classic, it is anyway but the only problem are the people who don't like superhero movies for superficial reasons without realising the emotion the actual good stories that are told, yes some things are cheesy but that's part of the fun it's  not meant to be serious the entire time, although this one is probably the most serious superhero movie yet and it worked because of what happened, about halfway through it stopped feeling like a normal marvel movie and turned into those movies that they force you to watch in high school that are definitely good don't get me wrong, but are usually old and all emotional and I don't feel like crying in class if I can avoid it, towards the end I started to feel bad for all the parents who took their young kids to see the movie they are probably gonna need therapy, but that's not a fault on the movie though, what I will say is that this movie is too good to spoil so if you haven't seen it yet, watch it now before you have the ending ruined. Speaking of spoilers this isn't gonna spoil much but it's just to address the attitude towards to ending, ok don't look if you haven't seen it yet




Many people complain about how the ending is gonna get undone all the deaths won't matter, and while it is true some of the characters have contracts and sequels coming up, the deaths still matter the characters that lived still see everyone around them die and they don't know about a 4th wall, and the pain that they go through seeing it happen is displayed quite well, you don't feel the pain of the people dying you feel the pain of the people left behind looking at the pile of ash and dust that was someone they cared about, just like in real life you don't feel the pain of dying you feel the pain or watching those around you die, and (If they get cremated) you then have the pile of dust as a remnant of all that's left

If I could give this a million stars if I could! It does everything I'd want a MARVEL movie to do! Whilst the cinematography is quite basic, the story, the CGI, and of course characters are absolutely INCREDIBLE! I can't wait for the next film! Top work everyone!
Really great movie! Everyone who loves MARVEL should go and watch it!
The issues aren't big enough to bring down my rating. A more unique title that sets up an exciting and mysterious sequel.
Too many characters but the movie keeps the flow going very nicely as they incorporate every character  in a very action packed and attention grabbing storylines
I loved it! Although I saw the first Avengers, I just wish I saw the previous movies that led up to this one! Uuuggghhh!

This is one for Marvel Comic Fans. 10 years of them waiting, and they appear to be very happy! However for me, I found the first 2/3 difficult to engage with. Far too many characters and split stories, also trying to remember /understand each character‚Äôs back story amongst & current their rapidly moving twisted storylineü§Ø. The last 1/3 provided continual, excellent action & plot twistsüòê, which rescued the film for me. So for me, it was very good - not excellent
Smh they made thanos into fortnite. Not cool marvel
